discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
The default value is 16777216 (16 MB) but can be increased to accommodate larger files.

Selected Answer: A
The default value is 16777216 (16 MB) but can be increased to accommodate larger files. The maximum file size supported is 5 GB for Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or Microsoft Azure stages

A - LIST (normal form)
B - LS (abbrev form)

Selected Answer: A
There is no LS command on snowsql

comments.content: Thanks for the correction and yes LS is the abbreviated for form of List, so both are correct

There is
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/list
Use the abbreviated form of the command to list all the files in the stage for the current user:
LS @~;

Because it asks for "abbreviated form" B is correct
I can see there is so A and B are correct
